mapper.update: update approval_process set PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVAL = #{approval,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPROVE_ID = #{approveId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPROVAL_FLG = #{approvalFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, OPINION = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, PERSON_ID, APPROVAL, APPROVE_ID, APPROVAL_FLG, OPINION, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from approval_process where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select ID, PERSON_ID, APPROVAL, APPROVE_ID, APPROVAL_FLG, OPINION, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from approval_process
